fees.waiverText: Fee waiver on annual spend of ₹2,00,000 or more

benefits.description: 10% cashback on Swiggy orders (monthly cap applies)
5% cashback on select online spends (monthly cap applies)
1% cashback on other spends (monthly cap applies)
Free Swiggy One membership for 3 months
Access to golf courses worldwide & 12 free lessons/year
Free 1 night stay & dining benefits at select places globally
12% instant discount on worldwide hotel bookings on Agoda

milestones.declaredReward: Fee waiver on annual spend milestone

declaredConstraints.description: 10% cashback on Swiggy spends upto ₹1,500 per month
5% cashback on select online spends upto ₹1,500 per month
1% cashback on other spends upto ₹500 per month
From any cashback: Rent, Utilities, Fuel, Insurance, EMI, Jewelry, Govt spends, Wallet loads & similar spends excluded
From 5% cashback: Flights, hotel, bookings & others excluded
Min transaction amount to qualify for cashback is Rs 100

declaredEligibility.description: Salaried: Nationality Indian, Age 21-60 years, Income (Monthly) ₹15,000 and above
